tabs.tab_title: What time is check-in and check-out?
tabs.tab_content: Check-in starts at 3:00 PM to ensure rooms are perfectly prepared for your arrival. Check-out is by 11:00 AM, allowing us time to refresh rooms for the next guest's luxurious stay.

tabs.tab_title: Do the rooms include free Wi-Fi?
tabs.tab_content: Yes, all rooms offer complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi to keep you connected throughout your stay, whether you need to work, stream your favorite shows, or stay in touch with friends and family.

tabs.tab_title: Are the rooms equipped with a minibar?
tabs.tab_content: Absolutely, each room features a fully stocked minibar with a variety of premium beverages and gourmet snacks, allowing you to indulge in luxurious treats without leaving the comfort of your room.

tabs.tab_title: Can I request an extra bed in the room?
tabs.tab_content: Yes, extra beds are available upon request. Please let us know in advance, and we will do our best to accommodate, subject to availability and the room's size restrictions for additional beds.

tabs.tab_title: Do your rooms have a sea view?
tabs.tab_content: Many of our rooms offer breathtaking sea views. If you'd like a sea-facing room, please specify your preference when booking, as availability can be limited during peak seasons or high-demand periods.

settings.ekit_heading_title: Get 30% off your stay with this {{limited-time}} luxury offer

settings.editor: Enjoy an unforgettable stay at Luxora with this special discount. Book now and take advantage of our exclusive, time-sensitive promotion.
